Text: I use logitechs microphone for wii :)

when i insert the disc it says about updates, but says if i have a modded system it may make it inoperable, i dont know what chip i have fitted, is it ok to do the updates off the disc or not, help please, many thanx...

should be ok if you mod is uptoate 1.9g
Using Pal Wii +usb loader and works OK first time, if using from disk try using (start patch) it stops the disk asking to update.
